users.description: Edit individual user details, passwords and groups membership.

index.description: The search index allows searching of submission content.

health.description: View some main diagnostics of application.

mail.description: Configure the SMTP server used to send notification emails.

ldap.description: Connect TPD to user directory servers - Active Directory and LDAP..

keystore.description: Manage certificate and key pairs used by application.

domibus.description: Configure the Domibus server used to send submission to E.U..

metrics.description: View some main metrics of application.

tracker.description: View all current users on the applicaton.

groups.description: Create groups and manage users within each group.
